div.p: The mission of Sophie B. Wright Charter School is to create a community of empowered learners in an atmosphere of mutual respect and trust. Every student will be inspired and challenged to learn, grow, and accomplish academic, social, and vocational goals.

h2.a:
Welcome Sophie B. Wright Warriors
to 2020-2021 School Year

td.br:
Sophie B. Wright student's grades have been updated in the system. Students who did not submit their assignments will receive the grade of a 0 with the opportunity to recover the term grade by May 10, 2020. The student must take the final exam. Students can use their phones, chromebooks, laptops or Ipads to complete and submit their required assignments to be awarded a Carnegie Unit. Please contact the teacher for additional information. The teacher are listed on the school's website under the Tab - About Us - Staff Bios. You can also send a message through the school's website. All messages are answered within 24 hours. It is out goal to support and teach every student through any event. We cannot give students grades if they have not submitted the requested classwork. We have worked hard to modify student assignments, test and quizzes as we continue to survive a national crisis.
Students will see the grade of an F and an I until the required work is submitted to the teacher by the due date of May 10, 2020. Again, if you are having technical difficulties, please email me through the website or let one the teachers of record of your child know.
Senior Students will not be eligible to graduate if they have not completed the required coursework. Please check PowerSchool for updated grades.

img.br: Students will receive a study guide for each enrolled subject on Friday, April 24, 2020.

td.br:
The time is now!!!
Member ID: 306575633
Password: 5i3T5k

img.br:
It was wonderful seeing most of your today. We miss each and everyone of you. Tomorrow, we will continue to put the remaining 15 signs in the yards of our Senior Students. If your address is different from the address in PowerSchool, please email the updated address with your name to us through the website by tomorrow morning.
If you live outside of Orleans Parish, we cannot deliver your sign. All students who attend Sophie B. Wright High School must reside in Orleans Parish . Students who have recently moved should notify us through the website immediately.
Senior refund checks are being mailed tomorrow ( April 16, 2020) for the items that you will not receive. It is our intention to still have a Senior Graduation Ceremony. We must wait for the Governor to give the school clearance.
All senior students will be cleared once the Senior Project is completed and final exams are graded. Please continue to log in and complete your assignments. Once you have been cleared, you will receive your Senior Pictures and additional information. Please check the website for the exam and senior presentation schedules that will be posted Friday afternoon.
Senior Project week is the week of April 20 - April 25, 2020. Seniors will report to regular online classes on April 27th and 28th. Senior Final Exams will start on April 29, 2020. Please see the schedule on the website.
The last day to submit final classwork that will count toward the May 11, 2020 graduation date is May 1, 2020. Any other classwork will be credited toward summer credit recovery and the Summer 2020 Graduation.
Senior Roll Call Day is May 7, 2020. The ZOOM information will be provided to all Senior students.

td.a: SBW DAILY INSTRUCTIONAL DISTANCE LEARNING INFORMATION/ SBW DIARIO DE INSTRUCCIÓN A DISTANCIA INFORMACIÓN - UPDATED - 4/1/20
td.br:
Sophie B. Wright has launched its Distance Learning Program. Please see the schedule of the student's daily schedule. Every student has been given a Google Email Account and Log On for the Google Classroom Suite. Students are expected to log on daily. Students can contact their teacher's daily. Please send all questions through the website. Questions will be answered within 24 hours. We will contact every student to make sure the student and parent's address , phone numbers and emails are correct in Power School.
INFORMACIÓN SBW DIARIO DE INSTRUCCIÓN A DISTANCIA
Sophie B. Wright ha puesto en marcha su Programa de Educación a Distancia. Por favor, vea el horario de programación diaria del estudiante. Cada estudiante se le ha dado una cuenta de correo electrónico Google y registro por el Google Classroom Suite. Se espera que los estudiantes para iniciar la sesión diaria. Los estudiantes pueden comunicarse con el maestro de todos los días. Por favor envíe todas las preguntas a través de la página web. Las preguntas serán contestadas dentro de las 24 horas. Nos pondremos en contacto con cada estudiante para asegurarse de que el estudiante y el domicilio de los padres, números de teléfono y correos electrónicos son correctos en Power School.
El

td.a: Wonderful Memories of a Great Man - Mr. Arthur Lowe
Mr. Arthur Lowe - A True Sophie B. Wright Warrior for Life!

img.br:
Mr. Arthur Lowe, a true Sophie B. Wright Warrior received his heavenly wings on Sunday, April 5, 2020.
Mr. Lowe has been a part of the SBW staff since 1988. His dedication to our school community and respect for others is one of the reasons he was loved by everyone he met. Mr. Lowe has had perfect attendance, never late or missing a day of work for 20+ years. Rain or shine, our school building was always opened on time. His professionalism and commitment to the students, parents, teachers and administration are both commendable and honorable.
We will always remember Mr. Lowe's bright smile, infectious laugh, and his love for the students and staff at Sophie B. Wright School.
Our school will never be the same now that Mr. Lowe is gone. Our heart are sad. Mr. Lowe will be honored with a tree in the front of the school with his nameplate.
